name: C&C 34-2
notes:
Listed here as the C&C 34-2 but most often referred to as the C&C 34/36. 
Available in three versions:
The "+" version is the 'racer-cruiser'. (wing keel option)
The "R" is a more race oriented version with a deeper keel. 
An "XL" version, introduced later, was meant to cover all the bases with "R" performance as well as cruising oriented interior.
